title: University Partnership
content: We have announced a partnership with The University of universities centre for learning. The partnership will facilitate the delivery of education  to more than 5,000 people across the firm by the end of 2024, including managers and other colleagues.

title: Clean Energy Focus
content: The worldâ€™s climate summit draws to a conclusion, new data shows that the majority of firms say action on recycling has slipped over the course of the pandemic. Low carbon energy consumption has become an increasing priority.

title: Welcome our new Chief of Staff!
content: Erian Tasha has recently been promoted from her long standing position as head of people and operations to become our new Chief of Staff. After 15 years they have proved themselves time and again to be an advocate for her colleagues and will now represent our team at the top table. Please join me in congratulating Erian on their new position and do everything you can to support them during this change.

title: Transatlantic survey reveals office workers tempted to resign over bad software
content: Survey of 3,000 office workers found that 61% of US respondents and 46% of British respondents would consider making the leap to a new job if employers provided better apps or software.
